00024 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrigger32GTIDTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00025 {
00026   fGTID = fTrigger32GTIDDecoder->GTIDOf(record);
00027   fTriggerBits = fTrigger32GTIDDecoder->EventTriggerBitsOf(record);
00028 
00029   // check severity to improve speed
00030   if(ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) { 
00031     ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): bits = " << fTriggerBits << ", gtid = " << fGTID << endl;
00032   }
00033 
00034   return kSuccess;
00035 }
